name: Sanctuary-Stop
description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.
message: A color-negative aura holds even time still.

description: A devil-breaker designed to fit over the arm and enhance demon-slaying capabilities. this particular model enhances its user's mobility.

name: Gerbera Jump
description: gunbreaker dash spell.

A devil-breaker designed to fit over the arm and enhance demon-slaying capabilities. this particular model was the first to be built and tested on live demons, it's functionality is quite simple: it shoots electricity at your foes.

description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.

A six-foot bow made from multiple materials for increased energy efficiency.  Complicated to make, but stronger than an all-wood longbow.

use_action.msg: You detach the magical string and straighten the bow into a sword.

description: This is an early modern sword seeing use in the 16th, 17th, and 18th centuries.  Called 'broad' to contrast with the slimmer rapiers.

use_action.msg: You recurve the magical sword into a bow shape.

description: A magically formed wire of blood that cuts like a razor.
//: A bullwhip's damage comes from the genuine miniature sonic boom it creates when you swing it fast enough, so it can actually harm something with a near-miss and can literally pop open the skin.

use_action.msg: You reform the blade's shape and the blood magically crystallizes.

description: A blade formed entirely from magical blood.

use_action.msg: Your blade liquifies and lashes out into a magical whip.

name: Aegis Storm-Breaker (Argentium)
description: A frost-breaker with a shielded hilt allowing for more protection, part of which can be detached and held as a buckler for even more defense.

use_action.msg: Your hilt detaches from your blade and remains in the air beside you.

name: Shield-form Aegis Storm-Breaker (Argentium)
description: By releasing a mechanism on the hilt of the blade the protective shield now floats beside you.

use_action.msg: You reattach the hilt to the blade.

name: Rev-Engine Blaze-Breaker (Ceruleum)
description: A blaze-breaker equipped with a throttle specially made for speeding up strikes.

use_action.msg: Your engine begins churning and roaring as you shift up gears.

name: Second-Gear Blaze-Breaker (Ceruleum)
description: By holding down the throttle at the hilt, the blade is able to be propelled at blinding speeds.

use_action.msg: You release the throttle and your engine halts.
